title: How to identify a Bluetooth device by pairing code - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I identify a Bluetooth device by pairing code? BT devices that transmit its pairing code will either display its code or state it in its Owner's Manual. Just make sure the code sent and the code displayed on the host match before accepting. If you're not sure, you could accept and then confirm the host is paired and connected to the correct device. If yes, you're done. If no, disconnect and forget that device from the host.
